price: He was grateful for His favors; He chose him and guided him to a straight path.
arabic: شَاكِرٗا لِّأَنۡعُمِهِۚ ٱجۡتَبَىٰهُ وَهَدَىٰهُ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٖ مُّسۡتَقِيمٖ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
